ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Dragons (was: The Hole is now live... (Patch message)
ygData.msgSnippet: It could be that high level players will suddenly find their spells hit for fractional damage, tanks might be dodged frequently, Hard to say here, I m just
ygData.messageBody:
It could be that high level players will suddenly find their spells
hit for fractional damage, tanks might be dodged frequently,

Hard to say here, I'm just guessing having never done these things
yet!!

However, is there not still an opportunity to make use of very high
level buffs, or healing from high level characters while fighting?
Might be no easier to take them down, but can probably fight longer
with the outside assistance?

A few random thoughts from a drunk bard *cough*

Bit disappointing as now I'm approaching the levels to go do these
things, most of the rest of the guild are hovering around 51/52 so
will soon be unable to help. /sighs, clearly disappointed.

--
Melaniel, Wood Elf Bard (46)
Expert bard, novice brewer, hardened drinker and terrific flirt!

Mith Marr server
